alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 12 at 9:53AM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills ranging from 25 below to 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills ranging from 35 below to 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM Saturday to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing and drifting snow can be expected Friday night through Saturday night.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
